com.kuka.roboticsAPI.applicationModel
Class RoboticsAPIApplication

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.roboticsAPI.applicationModel.tasks.RoboticsAPITask
      com.kuka.roboticsAPI.applicationModel.RoboticsAPIApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRoboticsAPIApplication, IRoboticsAPITask
Direct Known Subclasses:
SunriseApplication
public abstract class RoboticsAPIApplication
extends RoboticsAPITask
implements IRoboticsAPIApplication

Base class for RoboticsAPI applications.

Assumes a persistence engine with a application data source to access the persistent data through the convenience methods.

This element is not in its final state and might change in future versions.

Method Detail

runApplication

public void runApplication()
Convenience method that initializes, runs and disposes the application.

The dispose method will be called, even if an exception is thrown during initialization or run.

See Also:
RoboticsAPITask.initialize(), IRoboticsAPITask.run(), dispose()

dispose

public void dispose()
Description copied from class: RoboticsAPITask
Disposes this task. Use this to dispose the RoboticsAPI and all of your resources.

Basic implementation calls getContext().dispose().

It is imperative that you call super.dispose() when you override this method like this: 

 @Override
 public void dispose()
 {
     try
     {
         // TODO your code
     }
     finally
     {
         super.dispose();
     }
 }

Specified by:
dispose in interface IRoboticsAPITask
Overrides:
dispose in class RoboticsAPITask
